        "product": "Apple iPhone Retina 6s Plus 32GB",
        "user": "divya 1 khandelwal 1",
        "question": "i phone 6 rose gold is in out of stock? is tr any way to pre order now to avail the cash back and once it is in stock can u deliver??",
        "answer": "Buying an Iphone is total stupidity where u have to pay such a big price for it. Its better to pay half the price for android and you will get double the configuration and you will be more satisfied using it. In every aspect android is better. I dont know what other people think but this is what I think."

formdata.value:
24" FHD monitor with bezel-less design, AMD Freesync and 75hz refresh rate (60.4 cm) Bezel Less Flat LED Monitor, Smooth game play with AMD Freesync and Game mode
Relish your free time with this Samsung 43-inch Crystal 4K UHD smart TV. It is powered by Tizen OS and Crystal Processor 4K and is compatible with multiple voice assistants. The audio is enriched by 2CH speakers producing 20W output, Dolby Digital Plus, Q-Symphony. The HDR, Motion Xcelerator, PurColor assures detailed viewing. With PC Mode, you can perform all your PC or laptop works using the TV screen. You can free live stream Samsung TV Plus virtual channels. Moreover, the Content Guide and SmartThings app support make it a worth-having essential.
Resolution : 3840 x 2160 pixels | Refresh Rate : 60 Hz
Display Feature: PurColor | Crystal Processor 4K | 4K UHD Resolution | HDR | Motion Xcelerator | HDR 10+ | HLG | One Billion Color
Speaker Output : 20W | Q-Symphony | Dolby Digital Plus | Sound Mirroring | Adaptive Sound
Operating System : Tizen | Bixby | Google Assistant | Alexa | SmartThings App Support | Screen Mirroring | PC Mode | Tap View | Samsung TV Plus

The SpO2 sensor comprises of a single LED and dual photobodies embedded on the back of the watch. The infrared LED penetrates your skin, shining light on your blood vessels when you have it strapped on. The two photobodies then measure the quantity of the reflected light and calculate the total amount of blood oxygen in your body.
